Will
====

Wiimote on linux

Will is a simple program made in python using python-cwiid and python-xlib
The program is configurable to use the motion plus or the nunchuk as mouse pointer.

=== Use it ===

1)install python-cwiid and python-xlib on your system
2)edit config.yml with the following options:

 * mouse = [motion|nunchuck]
 * offset = [0-100]

 mouse is the type of control you want to use, offset is the pixel you move at each movement
3) python will.py
4) enjoy your wiimote

=== Info ===

I've created this software cause i'm far from an eletronic shop to buy ir leds and build a irda bar (yes, you can argue me that i didn't use 2 candles for trying, but i'm lazy)
I'm very optimist about the motion plus, it's a great piece of hw to use and to hack.

I've set for now simple actions with buttons:

 * A: left mouse click
 * B: right mouse click
 * +: zoom in
 * -: zoom out
 * home: reset pointer to center of screen

I'll get them configurable very soon.
Best use is with a raspberry pi, on board screen and a television, you can browse internet directly from wiimote without a mouse and a keyboard.

For any question mail me at: diego.luca.candido@gmail.com
